exercises.title: Entry Test exercises
exercises.content: This page is a graphical interface of the entry test I took, its purpose is to express you guys at Stockly my eagerness of joining your team!

exercise1.name: String Reverser
exercise1.content: Input something to reverse its order.

exercise2.name: Fizz Buzz
exercise2.content: Input a number and behold the magic of fizzbuzz!

exercise3.name: Perfect Squares
exercise3.content: Input an upper limit, all the perfect squares pertaining to the 0-to-upper-limit interval will be displayed.

exercise4.name: Camel to Kebab
exercise4.content: Input something in camel case – thisIsAnExample for instance – for it to be converted into its kebab case equivalent – which is this-is-an-example.
